valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 0.8,.  Estimated GFR = 70 if non African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  Estimated GFR = >75 if African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  For comparison, mean GFR for age group 70+ is 75 (mL/min/1.73 m2).  GFR<60 = Chronic Kidney Disease, GFR<15 = Kidney Failure.
